other_tests.findings: Histology samples showed sheets of histiocytes with collections of microabscesses, within which large numbers of Donovan bodies were highlighted on Giemsa and Warthin starry stains.
Confirmed meningitis with polymorphs 28 cells per mm³, lymphocytes 136 cells per mm³, total protein 0.46 g/L, glucose 2.6 mmol/L.
